Package mediautil.image.jpeg Description

This package consists of Utilities for Jpeg Images. Currently it features a class LLJTran for lossless Jpeg Transformation and classes like Exif (Which extends AbstractImageInfo) for handling Jpeg Image Header Information. LLJTran works with Sub Classes of AbstractImageInfo like Exif to provide for retrieving and changing Image Header Information as well.
